metadata.title: CVE-2023-4378 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 11.8 before 16.1.5, all versions starting from 16.2 before16.2.5, all versions starting from 16.3 before 16.3.1. A maliciousMaintainer can, under specific circumstances, leak the sentry token bychanging the configured URL in the Sentry error tracking settings page.This was as a result of an incomplete fix for CVE-2022-4365.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
